cellularland1

Class CAutomaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellularland1.CAutomaton

  • public class CAutomaton
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a cellular automaton, mainly its transition function and the initial position. Also assigns the rules numbers in order to set the color according to the rule used.

    • Method Detail

      • willSurvive

        public int willSurvive(int alive)
        Will a cell with the given number of living cells around survive?
        Parameters:
        alive - Number of cells around the cell that are alive.
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if it dies, number of the rule otherwise.

      • willBeBorn

        public int willBeBorn(int alive)
        Will a cell with the given number of living cells around be born?
        Parameters:
        alive - Number of cells around the cell that are alive.
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if it remains dead, number of the rule otherwise.
